timeline.bodyText: RelMdUtil#areColumnsDefinitelyUniqueWhenNullsFiltered has different implementation from RelMdUtil#areColumnsDefinitelyUnique. The former one would ignore null while the other one not. Why do you say they have same behavoirs?
timeline.author: chunweilei

replies.bodyText:
@chunweilei Thanks a lot for your careful review. They are different indeed.
However, areColumnsDefinitelyUniqueWhenNullsFiltered methods could be implemented in a more efficient way.
replies.author: liyafan82

timeline.bodyText: Could you add a test case which contains null literal?
timeline.author: chunweilei

replies.bodyText: Sure. Cases for null literals are added. Thanks for your good suggestion.
replies.author: liyafan82
